ygData.subject: Re: HTMLExtractor
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Gordan, I did some experiences with web http-header-check tool where the http-header-check server was located in the US. It seems that xing servers in US

Hello Gordan,

I did some experiences with web http-header-check tool where=
 the http-header-check server was located in the US. It seems that xing ser=
vers in US and Germany react differently (see below). The server located in=
 Germany (IP: 62.96.140.140) only delivers gzip-content.
See also: http://w=
ww.websitepulse.com/help/testtools.httpheaders-test.html (here you can choo=
se requests from Germany, Australia and the US).

And worse, even if I try =
to sent in the request http header an void accept-encoding (or identity) li=
ke: 
wget --header=3D'accept-encoding: identity' -S http://www.xing.com/de/=
directories/people/
I get an Http ERROR 406: Not Acceptable in the http-hea=
der reponse from the german xing server.

Unfortunately requesting an serve=
r in the US link 96.7.20.25/de/directories/people/index.html.gz didn't work=
 too (why??).

It seems there is no way for me to use heritrix out of the b=
ox for crawling xing.com/de/directories/people/ from Germany. Or do you hav=
e any suggestions (e.g. using a proyx, which decompresses the pages)  

Bes=
t regards, 
  Christian

t H1.14.3 configuration?

o not receive, compressed 
> content. Adding that as an option is an outsta=
nding feature-request -- 
> see [HER-
>

ng' header? Are you crawling through a 
> proxy (or perhaps transparent pro=
xy) that may have added this for you?

> - Gordon @ IA
